title: Harry S Truman National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       As a young boy, Harry Truman had three main interests: music, reading, and history, all encouraged by his mother, to whom he was very close. He got up at five every morning to practice the piano, which he studied twice a week until he was fifteen. Truman understood that you never stop learning. Today, children ages 5-12 can participate in our Junior Ranger program. After visiting the site and completing several Truman-related activities, children are sworn in as official Junior Rangers and receive a badge. You can also become a Web Ranger! Click here for more information.
